slash.name: Basic Slash
slash.description: A quick slash with a weapon.

basic_slash.name: Basic Slash
basic_slash.description: A quick slash with your weapon.

block.name: Block
block.description: Puts your shield where it should be, increasing armor briefly.

quickStep.name: Quick Step
quickStep.description: Take a quick step to increase speed briefly.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: A last resort. But it makes them bleed.

shieldBash.name: Shield Bash
shieldBash.description: Bashes the target with a shield, dealing damage and has a chance to stun.

battleCry.name: Battle Cry
battleCry.description: Lets out a battle cry that increases the damage of all allies.

throwRock.name: Throw Rock
throwRock.description: Throws a rock at the enemy, dealing physical damage.

swingTorch.name: Swing Torch
swingTorch.description: Swings a torch to deal damage and potentially burn the enemy.

blindWithTorch.name: Blind with Torch
blindWithTorch.description: Uses the torch to blind the enemy, reducing their accuracy.

hum.name: Hum
hum.description: Hums a tune to increase the user's accuracy temporarily.

healingWave.name: Healing Wave
healingWave.description: Heals an ally with a wave of restorative magic.

totemOfStrength.name: Totem of Strength
totemOfStrength.description: Places a totem that increases the strength of all allies in range.

mysticShield.name: Mystic Shield
mysticShield.description: Casts a protective shield that increases the armor of an ally.

healingTouch.name: Healing Touch
healingTouch.description: Heals an ally with a gentle touch.

quickStrike.name: Quick Strike
quickStrike.description: A rapid attack with a dagger.

poisonDart.name: Poison Dart
poisonDart.description: Shoots a poison dart that deals damage over time.

sneakAttack.name: Sneak Attack
sneakAttack.description: A stealthy attack that deals high damage and can stun the target.

acidFlask.name: Acid Flask
acidFlask.description: Throws an acid flask that deals damage and reduces the target's armor.

poisonCloud.name: Poison Cloud
poisonCloud.description: Creates a cloud of poison that deals damage over time to all enemies in range.

paralyzingPotion.name: Paralyzing Potion
paralyzingPotion.description: Throws a potion that has a chance to stun the target.

weakeningElixir.name: Weakening Elixir
weakeningElixir.description: Throws an elixir that reduces the target's strength.

toxicBomb.name: Toxic Bomb
toxicBomb.description: Throws a bomb that deals damage and reduces the target's dodge chance.

fireBlast.name: Fire Blast
fireBlast.description: Unleashes a blast of fire that deals damage and may cause burn.

wildfire.name: Wildfire
wildfire.description: Spreads fire that deals damage over time to all enemies and has a chance to spread to allies.

flameWave.name: Flame Wave
flameWave.description: A wave of flame that deals damage to all enemies in range and may hit allies.

explosivePotion.name: Explosive Potion
explosivePotion.description: Throws an explosive potion that deals massive damage and stuns, but can backfire.

poisonArrow.name: Poison Arrow
poisonArrow.description: Shoots a poisoned arrow that deals damage over time.

multiShot.name: Multi-Shot
multiShot.description: Fires multiple arrows at once, hitting multiple enemies.

explosiveArrow.name: Explosive Arrow
explosiveArrow.description: Shoots an explosive arrow that deals fire damage and may cause burn.

piercingShot.name: Piercing Shot
piercingShot.description: Fires an arrow that pierces through armor, reducing its effectiveness.

callOfTheWild.name: Call of the Wild
callOfTheWild.description: Summons a beast to fight alongside the Goblin Beastmaster.

savageStrike.name: Savage Strike
savageStrike.description: Commands a beast to strike, causing damage and bleeding.

packLeader.name: Pack Leader
packLeader.description: Increases the damage of all allied beasts.

ferociousRoar.name: Ferocious Roar
ferociousRoar.description: Unleashes a roar that reduces the armor of all enemies.

berserkSlash.name: Berserk Slash
berserkSlash.description: A furious slash that causes bleeding.

rageStrike.name: Rage Strike
rageStrike.description: A powerful strike fueled by rage, dealing significant damage.

frenzy.name: Frenzy
frenzy.description: Increases attack speed and damage for a short duration.

warCry.name: War Cry
warCry.description: A mighty war cry that reduces the damage of all enemies.

chieftainsStrike.name: Chieftains Strike
chieftainsStrike.description: A powerful strike that deals significant damage.

goblinsRally.name: Goblins Rally
goblinsRally.description: Rallies all goblins, increasing their damage output.

commandingPresence.name: Commanding Presence
commandingPresence.description: Increases the armor of all allied goblins.

battleRoar.name: Battle Roar
battleRoar.description: A mighty roar that reduces the damage of all enemies.

howl.name: Howl
howl.description: The wolf lets out a powerful howl, increasing the armor of all nearby allies.

packHunt.name: Pack Hunt
packHunt.description: The wolf calls its pack to hunt down the target, dealing damage and reducing their armor.

savageBite.name: Savage Bite
savageBite.description: A nasty bite that aims to make the target bleed.

swiftPounce.name: Swift Pounce
swiftPounce.description: The wolf pounces on the target, dealing damage and stunning them briefly.

furiousCharge.name: Furious Charge
furiousCharge.description: The wolf charges at its target with great force.

primalRage.name: Primal Rage
primalRage.description: The wolf enters a primal rage, increasing its damage for a short period.

backstab.name: Backstab
backstab.description: A surprise attack dealing extra damage and causing bleeding.

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description: Become invisible for a short duration, increasing damage and critical chance of the next attack.

throwingKnife.name: Throwing Knife
throwingKnife.description: Quickly throws a sharp knife at a foe.

smokeBomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smokeBomb.description: Blinds all enemies in the area.

poisonDagger.name: Poison Dagger
poisonDagger.description: Deals damage and poisons the target.

shadowStep.name: Shadow Step
shadowStep.description: Step through shadows to appear behind an enemy, dealing minor Shadow damage and preparing for a follow-up.

aimedShot.name: Aimed Shot
aimedShot.description: A carefully aimed shot that deals significant damage.

quickShot.name: Quick Shot
quickShot.description: A quick shot that deals moderate damage.

piercingArrow.name: Piercing Arrow
piercingArrow.description: An arrow that pierces through multiple enemies.

multishot.name: Multishot
multishot.description: Fires multiple arrows at once, hitting several enemies.

arrowRain.name: Arrow Rain
arrowRain.description: Releases a barrage of arrows, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

trickShot.name: Trick Shot
trickShot.description: A skillful shot that increases the archer's dodge chance.

viciousBite.name: Vicious Bite
viciousBite.description: A nasty bite that aims to make the target bleed.

scurry.name: Scurry
scurry.description: A quick dash to avoid attacks.

wildSwing.name: Wild Swing
wildSwing.description: A clumsy but forceful swing with a scavenged weapon.

erraticMovement.name: Erratic Movement
erraticMovement.description: Unpredictable movement makes the scavenger harder to hit.

desperateLunge.name: Desperate Lunge
desperateLunge.description: A reckless, powerful attack that leaves the scavenger exposed.

plantSpit.name: Plant Spit
plantSpit.description: Spits a glob of psychoactive plant matter, attempting to disorient.

energyBolt.name: Energy Bolt
energyBolt.description: Fires a bolt of crackling arcane energy.

stoneSlam.name: Stone Slam
stoneSlam.description: Slams a heavy stone limb into the target with concussive force.

fortifiedPlating.name: Fortified Plating
fortifiedPlating.description: Activates reinforced plating, significantly increasing armor.

mistBolt.name: Mist Bolt
mistBolt.description: Conjures a bolt of condensed fog that deals damage and clouds the target's vision.

etherealShift.name: Ethereal Shift
etherealShift.description: Phases partially into the ethereal plane, becoming harder to hit.

boneRattle.name: Bone Rattle
boneRattle.description: Clatters its bones menacingly, reducing enemy accuracy.

undeadResolve.name: Undead Resolve
undeadResolve.description: Hardens its skeletal form, increasing armor temporarily.

boneArrow.name: Bone Arrow
boneArrow.description: Fires a sharpened bone arrow that causes bleeding.

boneSpear.name: Bone Spear
boneSpear.description: Hurls a massive bone spear, piercing armor and dealing heavy damage.

deathPulse.name: Death Pulse
deathPulse.description: Emits a pulse of necromantic energy, weakening enemies.

necromanticRegeneration.name: Necromantic Regeneration
necromanticRegeneration.description: Channels necromantic energy to restore vitality.

electrifiedFlames.name: Electrified Flames
electrifiedFlames.description: Engulfs a target in flames charged with crackling electricity, dealing Fire damage, continuous Lightning damage, and making them vulnerable to Fire.

thunderousCombustion.name: Thunderous Combustion
thunderousCombustion.description: Ignites the air with a thunderous explosion of fire and lightning, damaging all enemies in an area and potentially stunning or disorienting them.

ballLightningFire.name: Ball Lightning Fire
ballLightningFire.description: Conjures a volatile sphere of crackling lightning and fire that moves towards enemies, exploding to deal AoE Lightning damage and potentially igniting them.

voltaicOverload.name: Voltaic Overload
voltaicOverload.description: Temporarily overcharges arcane energies. The next Fire or Lightning spell cast will be a guaranteed critical hit with amplified power, at a slightly increased mana cost.

conduitOfPower.name: Conduit of Power
conduitOfPower.description: Transforms the caster into a living conduit of elemental fury for a short duration, greatly increasing Fire and Lightning damage dealt and mana regeneration, but also making them more susceptible to incoming damage.

steamBlast.name: Steam Blast
steamBlast.description: Unleashes a focused blast of superheated steam, dealing Steam damage and scalding the target, reducing their accuracy.

scaldingMist.name: Scalding Mist
scaldingMist.description: Conjures a cloud of scalding mist that damages enemies over time and reduces their accuracy while they remain within it.

boilingGeyser.name: Boiling Geyser
boilingGeyser.description: Summons a geyser of boiling water and steam to erupt beneath a target, dealing massive Steam damage with a chance to knock them up and apply a severe scald.

superheatedCloud.name: Superheated Cloud
superheatedCloud.description: Creates a large cloud of superheated steam, dealing initial Fire damage, continuous Steam damage, and reducing the armor of enemies within.

flashBoil.name: Flash Boil
flashBoil.description: Instantly vaporizes nearby moisture into a burst of scalding steam around a target, dealing Steam damage and disorienting foes. More effective on wet targets.

pressureCook.name: Pressure Cook
pressureCook.description: Applies intense internal pressure to a target. After a short delay, or if the target is struck by a Fire spell, they erupt for massive Steam damage.

vaporize.name: Vaporize
vaporize.description: Briefly transforms the caster into a cloud of vapor, significantly increasing dodge chance and resistance to Fire and Water based attacks.

thermalCurrent.name: Thermal Current
thermalCurrent.description: Summons a powerful thermal current that pulls enemies together, dealing initial Steam damage and creating a lingering vortex of superheated air that continuously damages and slows foes.

runeOfBurning.name: Rune of Burning
runeOfBurning.description: Inscribes a powerful rune on the ground that erupts in flames when an enemy approaches or after a short time, dealing Fire damage and burning foes in an area.

explosiveGlyph.name: Explosive Glyph
explosiveGlyph.description: Attaches a volatile glyph to a target that detonates after a short delay, dealing significant Fire damage.

fireRuneTrap.name: Fire Rune Trap
fireRuneTrap.description: Sets a cunning rune trap. When triggered by an enemy, it erupts into a field of searing flames that continuously damages and slows foes within.

empowerWithRunesFire.name: Empower with Runes (Fire)
empowerWithRunesFire.description: Inscribes temporary runes of power, enhancing the damage and secondary effects of Fire spells for a short duration.

wallOfRunicFire.name: Wall of Runic Fire
wallOfRunicFire.description: Summons a searing wall of fire, etched with debilitating runes. Enemies passing through suffer Fire damage and are burned.

chainRuneBlast.name: Chain Rune Blast
chainRuneBlast.description: Launches a volatile rune that explodes on impact and chains to nearby enemies, dealing Fire damage. Chains are more potent against targets already burning or marked by other runes.

runeOfImmolation.name: Rune of Immolation
runeOfImmolation.description: The caster inscribes a powerful rune upon themselves that pulses waves of intense fire, damaging and burning all nearby enemies for a short duration.

decipherFlameRune.name: Decipher Flame Rune
decipherFlameRune.description: Channels profound runic knowledge, dramatically increasing Fire spell power and efficiency, while also empowering any active Fire Runes on the field for a period.

bloodfireBolt.name: Bloodfire Bolt
bloodfireBolt.description: Launches a bolt of fire fueled by life force, dealing Fire damage and cursing the target.

sacrificialPyre.name: Sacrificial Pyre
sacrificialPyre.description: Consumes a significant portion of health to unleash a devastating pyre around the caster, immolating nearby foes.

crimsonInferno.name: Crimson Inferno
crimsonInferno.description: Summons a raging inferno that burns enemies over time. Deaths within the inferno restore a portion of the caster's life force.

lifebloodIgnition.name: Lifeblood Ignition
lifebloodIgnition.description: Ignites your lifeblood, empowering your next Fire spell to deal increased damage and siphon health from its victims.

sanguineCombustion.name: Sanguine Combustion
sanguineCombustion.description: Inflicts a fiery, blood-fueled curse on a target. If the target dies while afflicted, they explode, dealing Fire damage to nearby enemies and healing the caster for each enemy caught in the blast.

drainVitalityFire.name: Drain Vitality (Fire)
drainVitalityFire.description: Channels a beam of fire that drains life from the target, dealing continuous Fire damage and healing the caster.

bloodBoil.name: Blood Boil
bloodBoil.description: Inflicts a horrific curse that causes the target's blood to boil, dealing escalating Fire damage over time. If the target perishes from this effect, they detonate violently.

forbiddenFlame.name: Forbidden Flame
forbiddenFlame.description: Unleashes a cataclysmic blast of forbidden fire, consuming a large portion of your life force to devastate enemies in a wide area and grant temporary invulnerability and immense lifesteal.

soulfireBolt.name: Soulfire Bolt
soulfireBolt.description: Hurls a bolt of accursed flame that sears both body and soul, dealing Fire and Necrotic damage with a chance to siphon mana.

raiseFlamingSkeleton.name: Raise Flaming Skeleton
raiseFlamingSkeleton.description: Summons skeletal warriors wreathed in perpetual fire to fight for the caster.

balefireStream.name: Balefire Stream
balefireStream.description: Channels a destructive stream of baleful energy mixed with fire, damaging the target and reducing healing they receive.

necroticImmolation.name: Necrotic Immolation
necroticImmolation.description: Engulfs an area in dark flames. Enemies within take continuous Fire damage, and those slain by the flames may rise as temporary undead servants.

consumingFlames.name: Consuming Flames
consumingFlames.description: Engulfs a single target in intense fire. If the target perishes, their essence fuels your necromantic power temporarily.

animateDeadFire.name: Animate Dead (Fire)
animateDeadFire.description: Reanimates a fallen corpse, imbuing it with unholy fire to create a potent fiery revenant.

soulBlaze.name: Soul Blaze
soulBlaze.description: Unleashes an explosion of soul-searing fire, dealing Fire and Necrotic damage to all enemies in an area and reducing their resistances to both elements.

lichfireAura.name: Lichfire Aura
lichfireAura.description: Wreathes the caster in an aura of chilling lichfire. Continuously damages nearby enemies with Fire and Necrotic energy, slowly heals the caster, and empowers their undead minions.

evasiveManeuver.name: Evasive Maneuver
evasiveManeuver.description: Perform an agile maneuver to temporarily increase dodge chance.

distract.name: Distract
distract.description: Cause a distraction, lowering a target's accuracy and making them more vulnerable to critical hits.

applyPoison.name: Apply Poison
applyPoison.description: Coat your weapon with a basic poison and strike, dealing minor damage and applying a poison DoT.

dirtyTrick.name: Dirty Trick
dirtyTrick.description: A cunning, underhanded move that deals minor damage and has a chance to stun the target.

shieldBlock.name: Shield Block
shieldBlock.description: Raise your shield, significantly increasing block chance and armor for a short duration.

powerStrike.name: Power Strike
powerStrike.description: A mighty blow that deals high physical damage.

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: Charge at an enemy, dealing minor damage and potentially stunning them.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description: Swing your weapon in a wide arc, hitting up to 2 enemies in front.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: Provoke an enemy, forcing them to attack you for a short duration and increasing your threat.

defensiveStance.name: Defensive Stance
defensiveStance.description: Adopt a defensive posture, increasing armor and block chance but slightly reducing damage output.

rendArmor.name: Rend Armor
rendArmor.description: A vicious strike aimed to damage and weaken the target's armor.

arcaneBolt.name: Arcane Bolt
arcaneBolt.description: Hurl a bolt of pure arcane energy at an enemy.

manaShield.name: Mana Shield
manaShield.description: Create a shield of mana that absorbs a portion of incoming damage, draining mana instead of health.

magicMissile.name: Magic Missile
magicMissile.description: Launch three missiles of magical energy that unerringly strike their target(s).

elementalBoltFire.name: Elemental Bolt (Fire)
elementalBoltFire.description: Launch a bolt of fire, dealing Fire damage and has a small chance to burn.

elementalBoltIce.name: Elemental Bolt (Ice)
elementalBoltIce.description: Launch a bolt of ice, dealing Ice damage and has a small chance to chill, reducing speed.

teleportShort.name: Teleport (Short)
teleportShort.description: Instantly teleport a short distance, gaining a momentary increase in dodge.

arcaneIntellectBuff.name: Arcane Intellect
arcaneIntellectBuff.description: Temporarily boost the Magic Power of an ally or self.

conjureRefreshment.name: Conjure Refreshment
conjureRefreshment.description: Conjure magical food and water, restoring a small amount of mana to the caster.

minorHeal.name: Minor Heal
minorHeal.description: A quick prayer to mend minor wounds.

smiteEvil.name: Smite Evil
smiteEvil.description: Call down holy energy to strike an unholy foe, dealing bonus damage to Undead or Demon types.

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: Bestow a divine blessing upon an ally, increasing their accuracy and damage slightly.

cureWounds.name: Cure Wounds
cureWounds.description: A focused prayer that mends moderate wounds and removes a minor poison or bleed effect.

holyLight.name: Holy Light
holyLight.description: Emit a burst of holy light, damaging nearby enemies and healing nearby allies.

turnUndead.name: Turn Undead
turnUndead.description: Channel divine power to repel or damage Undead creatures, causing them to flee or suffer extra damage.

prayerOfFortitude.name: Prayer of Fortitude
prayerOfFortitude.description: A divine prayer that bolsters the vitality of all allies, increasing their maximum health temporarily.

divineProtection.name: Divine Protection
divineProtection.description: Shield an ally with divine energy, reducing incoming damage for a short time.

daggerThrust.name: Dagger Thrust
daggerThrust.description: A precise thrust with a dagger, dealing moderate damage with increased critical chance.

twinStrikeDagger.name: Twin Strike
twinStrikeDagger.description: Quickly strike twice with daggers. Each hit has a chance to apply bleed.

shadowStrike.name: Shadow Strike
shadowStrike.description: Strike from the shadows, dealing Shadow damage. Deals significantly more damage if used from Stealth.

eviscerate.name: Eviscerate
eviscerate.description: A vicious finishing move that deals massive damage, especially to bleeding or low health targets.

poisonedBlade.name: Poisoned Blade
poisonedBlade.description: Strike with a poisoned dagger, dealing damage and applying a more potent poison.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Hurl a sphere of fire that explodes on impact, dealing Fire damage to the target and minor splash damage to adjacent enemies.

flameWall.name: Flame Wall
flameWall.description: Summon a wall of fire that damages enemies who pass through it or stand within it.

immolate.name: Immolate
immolate.description: Engulf a target in magical flames, dealing initial Fire damage and significant burning damage over time.

fireBlastMage.name: Fire Blast
fireBlastMage.description: A concentrated blast of fire dealing high damage. Has a chance to knock back the target.

holyFire.name: Holy Fire
holyFire.description: Engulf a target in holy fire, dealing initial Holy damage and burning them with sacred flames.

divineJudgment.name: Divine Judgment
divineJudgment.description: Call down a pillar of divine judgment, smiting a foe for massive Holy damage. Deals more damage to targets with negative status effects.

righteousFury.name: Righteous Fury
righteousFury.description: Enter a state of righteous fury, increasing your Holy damage and critical strike chance for a short period.

shadowstrikeCrit.name: Shadowstrike
shadowstrikeCrit.description: Strike from the deepest shadows, dealing high Shadow damage. Guaranteed critical hit if used from Stealth, and applies a potent Bleed.

vitalsTargeting.name: Vitals Targeting
vitalsTargeting.description: Focus intensely, your next few dagger attacks have a vastly increased critical hit chance and ignore a portion of enemy armor.

deathMark.name: Death Mark
deathMark.description: Mark an enemy for death. For a duration, all critical hits against the target by anyone deal bonus Shadow damage. If the target dies while marked, you regain some stamina and mana.

lavaBurst.name: Lava Burst
lavaBurst.description: Hurl a glob of molten rock that explodes, dealing Fire damage to the target and splash Earth damage to nearby foes. Leaves a small patch of molten ground.

moltenShield.name: Molten Shield
moltenShield.description: Encase an ally (or self) in a shield of cooling magma, granting significant armor and Fire resistance, and damaging melee attackers with heat.

volcanicEruption.name: Volcanic Eruption
volcanicEruption.description: Cause a targeted area to erupt like a small volcano, spewing lava and rock. Deals AoE Fire and Earth damage and creates a large area of difficult, burning terrain.

magmaGolemSummon.name: Summon Magma Golem
magmaGolemSummon.description: Summon a formidable Magma Golem to fight by your side. The golem is resilient and burns nearby enemies.

plasmaBolt.name: Plasma Bolt
plasmaBolt.description: Hurls a volatile bolt of plasma, dealing Fire damage and additional Lightning damage, and leaving the target susceptible to further Lightning damage.

lightningFirestorm.name: Lightning Firestorm
lightningFirestorm.description: Calls down a chaotic storm of fire and lightning in an area, dealing initial Fire damage and then continuous Fire and intermittent Lightning damage to enemies within.

staticInferno.name: Static Inferno
staticInferno.description: Wreathes the caster in an aura of static electricity and embers. Periodically zaps nearby enemies and grants your Fire spells a chance to arc lightning to another foe.

blessedHealingWave.name: Blessed Healing Wave
blessedHealingWave.description: A powerful wave of healing energy that also bestows a minor blessing of fortitude.

circleOfBenevolence.name: Circle of Benevolence
circleOfBenevolence.description: Channels a soothing circle of divine energy, healing all allies within it over time and granting them a protective blessing.

divineRenewal.name: Divine Renewal
divineRenewal.description: Instantly heals a target and applies a potent heal-over-time effect, also attempting to dispel a curse or disease.

auraOfLife.name: Aura of Life
auraOfLife.description: Emanates a powerful aura of life, continuously healing nearby allies and bolstering their resistance to necrotic energies.

cripplingStab.name: Crippling Stab
cripplingStab.description: Stab at a vulnerable point, dealing damage and reducing the target's movement speed and dodge. If used from Stealth, the debuff is stronger.

fanOfDaggers.name: Fan of Daggers
fanOfDaggers.description: Throw a spray of daggers, hitting multiple enemies in a cone in front of you. Each dagger has a chance to apply bleed. More effective if used after an Evasive Maneuver.

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: Instantly disappear from sight, entering an improved Stealth. Your next attack from this Stealth deals massively increased critical damage and has bonus accuracy. Removes most DoTs.

huntersMark.name: Hunter's Mark
huntersMark.description: Mark a target, increasing all damage they take from you and your allies for a duration. Reveals stealthed targets and makes them more vulnerable to your Bow attacks.

silentShot.name: Silent Shot
silentShot.description: Fire a carefully aimed shot that deals high damage. If used from Stealth, does not break Stealth, deals bonus damage, and has increased critical chance.

volley.name: Volley
volley.description: Fire a rapid volley of arrows at a designated area, damaging all enemies within. If Hunter's Mark is active on any target in the area, arrows are more likely to hit vitals (bonus crit chance).

twinSlash.name: Twin Slash
twinSlash.description: Rapidly slash twice with your dual-wielded weapons. Each hit has a chance to reduce enemy's accuracy.

bladeFlurry.name: Blade Flurry
bladeFlurry.description: Unleash a flurry of quick strikes, hitting the primary target multiple times or spreading to nearby enemies if the primary target dies.

whirlingSteel.name: Whirling Steel
whirlingSteel.description: Spin in a whirlwind of flashing steel, damaging all nearby enemies and gaining temporary increased dodge.

dualDeflection.name: Dual Deflection
dualDeflection.description: Skillfully use your twin blades to deflect incoming attacks, greatly increasing your block/parry chance for a short time. Successful deflections grant a small speed boost.

coordinatedAssault.name: Coordinated Assault
coordinatedAssault.description: Strike in concert with an ally. You and a nearby ally both attack the target. Your combined damage is increased if the target is debuffed.

riposteDual.name: Dual Riposte
riposteDual.description: After successfully parrying an attack, unleash a swift counter-attack with both weapons.

crossCut.name: Cross Cut
crossCut.description: Deliver a powerful scissor-like strike with both weapons. If the target is bleeding, this attack deals critical damage.

danceOfBlades.name: Dance of Blades
danceOfBlades.description: Enter a fluid combat dance for a duration, increasing attack speed, dodge, and causing your dual-wield attacks to occasionally strike an additional nearby enemy.

preciseSlashOneHand.name: Precise Slash
preciseSlashOneHand.description: A carefully aimed slash with your one-handed weapon, boasting higher accuracy and critical hit chance.

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description: After a successful parry, deliver a swift and damaging counter-attack.

bladeDanceOneHand.name: Blade Dance
bladeDanceOneHand.description: Execute a series of rapid slashes against a single target, or an adjacent one if the primary is defeated. Each hit slightly increases your dodge.

disarmingStrike.name: Disarming Strike
disarmingStrike.description: Attempt to disarm your opponent, dealing damage and having a chance to reduce their damage output significantly for a short time.

feint.name: Feint
feint.description: Make a deceptive move, dealing minor damage and forcing the enemy to lower their guard, reducing their block chance.

challengeDuel.name: Challenge to Duel
challengeDuel.description: Challenge an enemy to a duel. For the duration, you deal increased damage to them and they deal reduced damage to your allies.

honedEdge.name: Honed Edge
honedEdge.description: Carefully hone your blade, granting your next few one-handed attacks increased damage and armor penetration.

warriorsResolve.name: Warrior's Resolve
warriorsResolve.description: Steel your resolve, becoming highly resistant to stuns and fear effects and gaining a temporary boost to vitality.

guardAlly.name: Guard Ally
guardAlly.description: Protect a chosen ally, redirecting a portion of the damage they would take to yourself and increasing their armor.

phalanxFormation.name: Phalanx Formation
phalanxFormation.description: Form a defensive line with nearby allies. You and adjacent allies gain increased armor and block chance. Movement is restricted.

shieldWall.name: Shield Wall
shieldWall.description: Become an immovable bastion, massively increasing your block chance and damage reduction from the front but reducing your movement and attack speed.

retaliationStrike.name: Retaliation Strike
retaliationStrike.description: After successfully blocking an attack, immediately strike back at the attacker with your weapon and shield.

holdTheLine.name: Hold the Line
holdTheLine.description: Inspire allies to hold their ground. You and nearby allies become highly resistant to knockback and gain increased stun resistance.

protectorsVow.name: Protector's Vow
protectorsVow.description: Vow to protect an ally. While active, any damage they take below 30% health is significantly reduced, and you gain a burst of healing if they are saved from a fatal blow by this effect.

divineShieldBash.name: Divine Shield Bash
divineShieldBash.description: Bash with your shield, infused with holy energy. Deals Blunt and Holy damage, and has a high chance to daze the target, reducing their damage output.

mightyBlow.name: Mighty Blow
mightyBlow.description: A powerful overhead strike with a two-handed weapon, dealing immense damage.

sweepingStrike.name: Sweeping Strike
sweepingStrike.description: Swing your great weapon in a wide arc, hitting multiple enemies in front of you. Higher chance to critically hit if only one target is hit.

earthshakerSlam.name: Earthshaker Slam
earthshakerSlam.description: Slam your weapon into the ground with tremendous force, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and potentially stunning them.

executionersChop.name: Executioner's Chop
executionersChop.description: A devastating blow aimed to finish off a weakened foe. Deals significantly more damage to targets below 30% health.

shatteringBlow.name: Shattering Blow
shatteringBlow.description: A forceful strike that shatters armor, significantly reducing the target's armor for a duration.

brutalCharge.name: Brutal Charge
brutalCharge.description: Charge recklessly at a distant foe, dealing damage and knocking them back. You take minor recoil damage.

indomitableSmash.name: Indomitable Smash
indomitableSmash.description: Gather all your strength for an unstoppable smash. This attack cannot be blocked or parried, and ignores a portion of armor.

battleRush.name: Battle Rush
battleRush.description: Enter a battle frenzy, increasing your movement speed and attack speed temporarily. Your attacks have a chance to daze enemies.

searingRay.name: Searing Ray
searingRay.description: Focus a beam of intense fire on a target, dealing continuous Fire damage. Each tick reduces the target's Fire resistance.

heatWave.name: Heat Wave
heatWave.description: Release a wave of superheated air, damaging all enemies and reducing their accuracy due to shimmering heat.

combustion.name: Combustion
combustion.description: Cause a burning target to violently combust, dealing AoE Fire damage. Consumes Burn effects on the primary target for bonus damage.

fireShieldSelf.name: Fire Shield
fireShieldSelf.description: Wreathe yourself in a shield of flames, granting Fire resistance and damaging melee attackers.
